comment.author: 16489083@N05
comment._content: She is lovely... do we know who she is? You know the National Library of Ireland archives, (see: www.flickr.com/photos/nlireland/8184552241/in/contacts/ ) has a Flickr stream and the people join in to help ID the places and people in the images posted... we need to do that here... that said I do not know who this might be. Thanks for sharing this awesome portrait!!!
comment.authorname: maorlando God kept us 2013 leaning on Him 2014
